articles.description: The Brooklyn Nets will be without Kyrie Irving and LaMarcus Aldridge on Monday, when they take on the Timberwolves in Minnesota.
articles.content:
NEW YORK -- Kyrie Irving will not play in the Brooklyn Nets' game against the Minnesota Timberwolves on Monday. He is out due to personal reasons, the team announced.

articles.author: Sam McClure
articles.title: Retired Blue Simpson in shock comeback bid - The Age
articles.description: Kade Simpson retired from football after 18 seasons at Carlton. But as he heads towards his 37th birthday, he wants to play AFL football again.
articles.content:
Retired Carlton veteran Kade Simpson has put himself on the market for this years mid-season draft, declaring he wants to continue his AFL career.
